commit message: New build tools/gradle

1.0.3.3b1

Log duration changed

Hysteresis in signalhop

build changes
Threaded work in LogFragment to prevent UI thread blocking
Bugfix: NPE could occur when fragment detached
Bugfix: ThreadHandler leak
Checking in b3 so I can start a new test branch
Bugfix: NPE when LogFragment detached
Re-implemented LogFragment's work in an AsyncTaskLoader.  Moved API keys to a secure string file in preparation for in-app billing.
RC1  Bugfix for occasional 'leaking' network checks on mobile data
Leaking mobile data bugfix attempt #2
shutting lint up
Bugfix: Rare NPE in LogOpenHelper
Text changes
Design change

Bugfix: Toggleservice could get stuck

Better logging for wake locks

Reimplementation of network check leaking to mobile data bugfix
Bugfix: cached known networks were incorrectly retained when out of range, could lead to shenanigans
Widgets set flag correctly on remove/add
All references to developer email address now come from @string/email
Preparing for full localization of strings
Send log now uses secure storage and FileProvider to send the log using another app securely.  Log is only ever written to sdcard if user specifies.
Strings, design tweaks, bugfix
Release 1.0.3.3
